question: Will BTC close above $69,000 on Feb 15, 2026?
reasoning: Daily volatility overpriced on catalyst-free days. Market at 55% overestimates 0.7% daily move probability. Regression to mean suggests ~50% is fair.

question: Will gold close above $2,100/oz by Feb 21, 2026?

question: Will S&P 500 close above 5,850 by Feb 21, 2026?
